Is it actually a problem with the Point3D class or is there a problem with the specific test?
You need to give me the change in the correct format for merging.
The merging code required the complete method. You can leave out methods that are not changing but the methods you generate must be complete as the exising method is going to be completly replaced.

title: Debugging and Fixing NURBS Library Test Suite in JavaScript
